TopicTitle: is anyone else having an issue with the game freezing at the load screen

Articles.Content: when i try to launch i get stuck at the load screen it says loading asset bundle (something)i think its asset bundle definitions but no matter how many times i try i can't get past it anyone else have this issue

I do find that when I get to loading the asset bundle, it will take some time to load it. Then it will jump back, load some other stuff and it takes me to the loading screen. How long did you wait for it to pass? I did actually think that it got stuck on the asset bundle the first few times myself but after waiting, it passed.
Hi @FoX57, to help you you need to help us by giving us more information on what's going on, so please take a look at this thread and provide your logs, thank you.
ok thx for the reply i found a fix it works now if i run the program as an administrator but thank you
